name: Project Eastwood Forest
description:
You and your friends decide to explore the forest where people experimented.

The forest has famous rumors about people going missing there. You and your friends decide to see for yourself if the rumors are true

You go later to the forest after your friends. But then you find out something happened to them.

This is my first game made so I hope you like it!

Controls

  • WASD - Movement
  • E - Interact
  • Shift - Run
